actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution for negotiations on the Turkish opium ban.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should: (1) immediately initiate negotiations at the highest level of the Turkish Government to prevent the resumption of opium production; and (2) if such negotiations prove unfruitful, exercise the authority provided by the Congress under specified provisions of the Foreign Assistance Act to terminate all assistance to the Government of Turkey.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution for negotiations on the Turkish opium ban.
